about.title: About Odyssee Travel Services
about.description1: With over {years} years of experience in the travel industry, Odyssee Travel is a travel agency founded in 1999, with its headquarters located on Ennakhil Boulevard, Khezama Est, Sousse. We offer a wide range of services: flights, accommodations, and tailor-made journeys, whether in Tunisia or across the globe.
about.description2: Our team of specialized travel advisors is always at your service, dedicated to turning your travel dreams into unique, authentic, and memorable experiences.

support.title: 24/7 Support
support.description: We're here whenever you need us
